TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPGlobalProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关本地计算机的网络连接的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the network connectivity of the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供配置和本地计算机的网络接口和网络连接有关的统计信息。This class provides configuration and statistical information about the local computer's network interfaces and network connections. 此类提供的信息是类似于所提供的 Internet 协议帮助程序 API 函数。The information provided by this class is similar to that provided by the Internet Protocol Helper API functions. 有关 Internet 协议帮助程序的信息，请参阅 MSDN 库中的文档。For information about the Internet Protocol Helper, see the documentation in the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示有关本地计算机使用此类的实例的信息。The following code example displays information about the local computer using an instance of this class. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

summary.span: 开始一个用于在本地计算机上检索固定不变的单播 IP 地址表的异步请求。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request to retrieve the stable unicast IP address table on the local computer.
An that references the asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了支持出站连接或接受 Teredo 接口上的传入连接，应用程序需要确保 Teredo 接口可启动并可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 这是时间的因为 Teredo 可以进入休眠状态时未使用段。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法允许应用程序以异步方式检索稳定的单播 IP 地址的列表。The method allows an application to asynchronously retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses. 属性可以用于确定 IP 地址是否为 IPv6 Teredo 地址前缀为 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法也会返回非 Teredo 地址，并提供了更方便的方式获取比枚举所有的系统的 IP 地址的单播上本地计算机和查询关联的 IP 地址的对象。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

exception.span: 此方法在该平台上未实现。

span.span: This method is not implemented on the platform.

exception.span: 此方法使用 Windows Vista 和更高版本的操作系统上支持的本机 函数。

span.span: This method uses the native function that is supported on Windows Vista and later.

exception.span: 调用本机 函数失败。

span.span: The call to the native function failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DHCP 作用域是位于同一子网的网络计算机的管理分组。A DHCP scope is an administrative grouping of networked computers that are on the same subnet. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示本地计算机的网络信息。The following code example displays network information for the local computer. summary.span: 结束一个挂起的用于在本地计算机上检索固定不变的单播 IP 地址表的异步请求。

span.span: Ends a pending asynchronous request to retrieve the stable unicast IP address table on the local computer.

returns.span: ，它存储此异步操作的状态信息以及所有用户定义数据。

span.span: An that stores state information and any user defined data for this asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了支持出站连接或接受 Teredo 接口上的传入连接，应用程序需要确保 Teredo 接口可启动并可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 这是时间的因为 Teredo 可以进入休眠状态时未使用段。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法允许应用程序以异步方式检索稳定的单播 IP 地址的列表。The method allows an application to asynchronously retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses. 属性可以用于确定 IP 地址是否为 IPv6 Teredo 地址前缀为 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法结束挂起的异步请求用于检索稳定的单播 IP 地址表。The method ends a pending asynchronous request to retrieve the stable unicast IP address table. 方法也会返回非 Teredo 地址，并提供了更方便的方式获取比枚举所有的系统的 IP 地址的单播上本地计算机和查询关联的 IP 地址的对象。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

summary.span: 返回有关本地计算机上的 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 和 IPv6 传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接的信息。

span.span: Returns information about the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) and IPv6 Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections on the local computer.

returns.span: 一个 数组，其中包含描述活动 TCP 连接的对象；如果没有检测到活动 TCP 连接，则为一个空数组。

span.span: A array that contains objects that describe the active TCP connections, or an empty array if no active TCP connections are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的对象以外的所有 TCP 状态中包括连接状态。The objects returned by this method include connections in all TCP states except the state. 可以通过调用来检查连接状态。You can check the state of a connection by calling . TCP 协议在 IETF RFC 793 中定义。The TCP protocol is defined in IETF RFC 793. 请注意，此方法返回的对象将反映截至该数组创建的时的连接。Note that the objects returned by this method reflect the connections as of the time the array is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下面的示例显示活动 TCP 连接的终结点信息。The following example displays endpoint information for active TCP connections. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#17)]

exception.span: Win32 函数 失败。

span.span: The Win32 function failed.
for reading network information.

summary.span: 返回有关本地计算机上的 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 和 IPv6 传输控制协议 (TCP) 侦听器的终结点信息。

span.span: Returns endpoint information about the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) and IPv6 Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) listeners on the local computer.

returns.span: 一个 数组，其中包含描述活动 TCP 侦听器的对象；如果没有检测到活动 TCP 侦听器，则为一个空数组。

span.span: A array that contains objects that describe the active TCP listeners, or an empty array, if no active TCP listeners are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的对象以外的所有 TCP 状态中包括侦听器状态。The objects returned by this method include listeners in all TCP states except the state. TCP 协议在 IETF RFC 793 中定义。The TCP protocol is defined in IETF RFC 793. 请注意，此方法返回的对象将反映截至该数组创建的时的连接。Note that the objects returned by this method reflect the connections as of the time the array is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示活动 TCP 侦听器的终结点信息。The following code example displays endpoint information for active TCP listeners. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.IPEndPoint[] GetActiveUdpListeners() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetActiveUdpListeners () As IPEndPoint()

summary.span: 返回有关本地计算机上的 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 和 IPv6 用户数据报协议 (UDP) 侦听器的信息。

span.span: Returns information about the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) and IPv6 User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listeners on the local computer.

returns.span: 一个 数组，其中包含描述活动 UDP 侦听器的对象；如果没有检测到活动 UDP 侦听器，则为一个空数组。

span.span: An array that contains objects that describe the UDP listeners, or an empty array if no UDP listeners are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UDP 是无连接的传输层协议，它负责发送和接收数据报。UDP is a connectionless transport layer protocol that is responsible for sending and receiving datagrams. 它是在 IETF RFC 768 中定义的。It is defined in IETF RFC 768. UDP 侦听器是打开的套接字，等待接收 UDP 数据报。A UDP listener is an open socket that waits for and receives UDP datagrams. 因为 UDP 是无连接协议，该侦听器不维护与远程终结点的连接。Because UDP is a connectionless protocol, the listener does not maintain a connection to a remote endpoint. ## Examples 以下示例显示活动的 UDP 侦听器。The following example displays the active UDP listeners. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.IcmpV4Statistics GetIcmpV4Statistics() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetIcmpV4Statistics () As IcmpV4Statistics

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 版本 4 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) version 4 statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 对象，提供本地计算机的 ICMP 版本 4 通信统计数据。

span.span: An object that provides ICMP version 4 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMP 是一组与 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 一起使用的消息。ICMP is a set of messages for use with Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ICMP 使用 IPv4 节点遇到在处理数据包并执行其他 Internet 层函数报告错误。ICMP is used by IPv4 nodes to report errors encountered in processing data packets and to perform other Internet layer functions. IETF RFC 792 中定义了 ICMP 版本 4。ICMP version 4 is defined in IETF RFC 792. 有关可用于应用程序的 ICMP 版本 4 流量统计信息的详细信息，请参阅类文档。For details on the ICMP version 4 traffic statistics that are available to applications, see the class documentation. 请注意，此方法返回的对象会反映创建该对象的时间的统计信息。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 以下示例显示当前 ICMPv4 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv4 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.IcmpV6Statistics GetIcmpV6Statistics() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetIcmpV6Statistics () As IcmpV6Statistics

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 版本 6 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) version 6 statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 一个 对象，提供本地计算机的 ICMP 版本 6 流量统计数据。

span.span: An object that provides ICMP version 6 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMP 版本 6 是一组用于 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 的消息。ICMP version 6 is a set of messages for use with Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). 遇到在处理数据包并执行其他 Internet 层函数报告错误的 IPv6 节点使用 ICMP。ICMP is used by IPv6 nodes to report errors encountered in processing data packets and to perform other Internet layer functions. IETF RFC 1885 中定义了 ICMP 版本 6。ICMP version 6 is defined in IETF RFC 1885. 具有 Windows 2000 或更早的操作系统的计算机不支持 IPv6 协议。The IPv6 protocol is not supported for computers with Windows 2000 or earlier operating systems. 有关可用于应用程序的 ICMP 版本 6 流量统计信息的详细信息，请参阅类文档。For details on the ICMP version 6 traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 请注意，此方法返回的对象会反映创建该对象的时间的统计信息。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 以下示例显示当前 ICMPv6 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv6 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#7)]

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 协议版本 4 (IPv4) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 对象，提供本地计算机的 IPv4 通信统计数据。

span.span: An object that provides IPv4 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IPv4 是负责路由到其目标数据包设置从其源计算机的网络层协议。IPv4 is a network layer protocol that is responsible for routing data packets from its source computer to its destination. 有关可用于应用程序的 IP 流量统计信息的详细信息，请参阅类文档。For details on the IP traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 请注意，此方法返回的对象都将反映的时间的统计信息创建对象。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示本地计算机的 IP 统计信息。The following code example displays IP statistics for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#1)]

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 对象，提供本地计算机的 IPv6 通信统计数据。

span.span: An object that provides IPv6 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IPv6 是负责将路由到其目标数据包设置从其源计算机的网络层协议。IPv6 is a network layer protocol responsible for routing data packets from its source computer to its destination. 与 Windows 2000 或更早的操作系统的计算机上不支持 IPv6 协议。The IPv6 protocol is not supported on computers with Windows 2000 or earlier operating systems. 有关可用于应用程序的 IP 流量统计信息的详细信息，请参阅类文档。For details on the IP traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 请注意，此方法返回的对象都将反映的时间的统计信息创建对象。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示本地计算机的 IP 统计信息。The following code example displays IP statistics for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#1)]

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的传输控制协议/Internet 协议版本 4 (TCP/IPv4) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol version 4 (TCP/IPv4) statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 对象，提供本地计算机的 TCP/IPv4 通信统计数据。

span.span: A object that provides TCP/IPv4 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TCP 是负责可靠地发送和接收数据包的传输层协议。TCP is a transport layer protocol that is responsible for reliably sending and receiving data packets. 它定义在 IETF RFC 793。It is defined in IETF RFC 793. 有关可用于应用程序的 TCP 流量统计信息的详细信息，请参阅类文档。For details on the TCP traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 请注意，此方法返回的对象都将反映的时间的统计信息创建对象。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 以下示例显示本地计算机的 TCP/IP 统计信息。The following example displays the TCP/IP statistics for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks UDP 是无连接的传输层协议，它负责发送和接收数据报。UDP is a connectionless transport layer protocol that is responsible for sending and receiving datagrams. 它是在 IETF RFC 768 中定义的。It is defined in IETF RFC 768. 有关可用于应用程序的 UDP 流量统计信息的详细信息，请参阅类文档。For details on the UDP traffic statistics that are available to applications, see the class documentation. 请注意，此方法返回的对象都将反映的时间的统计信息创建对象。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 此信息不是动态更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 以下示例显示本地计算机的 UDP/IP 统计信息。The following example displays the UDP/IP statistics for the local computer. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection GetUnicastAddresses() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetUnicastAddresses () As UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection

abstract member GetUnicastAddresses : unit -> System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection override this.GetUnicastAddresses : unit -> System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection

summary.span: 在本地计算机上检索固定不变的单播 IP 地址表。

span.span: Retrieves the stable unicast IP address table on the local computer.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含本地计算机上的固定不变的单播 IP 地址的列表。

span.span: A that contains a list of stable unicast IP addresses on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了支持出站连接或接受 Teredo 接口上的传入连接，应用程序需要确保 Teredo 接口可启动并可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 这是时间的因为 Teredo 可以进入休眠状态时未使用段。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法将允许应用程序检索稳定的单播 IP 地址的列表。The method will allow an application to retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses. 属性可以用于确定 IP 地址是否为 IPv6 Teredo 地址前缀为 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法也会返回非 Teredo 地址，并提供了更方便的方式获取比枚举所有的系统的 IP 地址的单播上本地计算机和查询关联的 IP 地址的对象。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

exception.span: 调用本机 函数失败。

span.span: The call to the native function failed.

exception.span: 此方法在该平台上未实现。

span.span: This method is not implemented on the platform.

exception.span: 此方法使用 Windows Vista 和更高版本的操作系统支持的本机 函数。

span.span: This method uses the native function that is supported on Windows Vista and later.

exception.span: 调用方没有必需的 权限。

span.span: The caller does not have necessary permission.

exception.span: 调用本机 函数失败。

span.span: The call to the native function failed.

abstract member GetUnicastAddressesAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection> override this.GetUnicastAddressesAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection>

summary.span: 检索本地计算机上稳定的单播 IP 地址表以作为异步操作。

span.span: Retrieves the stable unicast IP address table on the local computer as an asynchronous operation.
Returns .

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了支持出站连接或接受 Teredo 接口上的传入连接，应用程序需要确保 Teredo 接口可启动并可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 这是时间的因为 Teredo 可以进入休眠状态时未使用段。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法将允许应用程序检索异步操作的形式的稳定的单播 IP 地址列表。The method will allow an application to retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses as asynchronous operation. 属性可以用于确定 IP 地址是否为 IPv6 Teredo 地址前缀为 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法也会返回非 Teredo 地址，并提供了更方便的方式获取比枚举所有的系统的 IP 地址的单播上本地计算机和查询关联的 IP 地址的对象。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property HostName As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ HostName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取本地计算机的主机名。

span.span: Gets the host name for the local computer.

value.span: 包含计算机的 NetBIOS 名称的 实例。

span.span: A instance that contains the computer's NetBIOS name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性会调入本机 IP 帮助程序函数，GetNetworkParams，返回 FIXED_INFO 结构，其中包含 NetBIOS 主机名的字符串。This property calls into the native IP Helper function, GetNetworkParams, which returns a FIXED_INFO structure that contains the NetBIOS host name string. 当超过 15 个字符时，主机名称字符串被截断。The host name string is truncated when it exceeds 15 characters. 计算机的 NetBIOS 名称在网络中必须唯一，并不完全限定的域名。A computer's NetBIOS name must be unique within a network and is not fully qualified by the domain name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示本地计算机的网络信息。The following code example displays network information for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#15)]

exception.span: Win32 函数调用失败。

span.span: A Win32 function call failed.
for reading network information.

summary.span: 获取 值，该值指定本地计算机是否作为 Windows Internet 名称服务 (WINS) 代理。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the local computer is acting as a Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) proxy.

value.span: 如果本地计算机是 WINS 代理，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the local computer is a WINS proxy; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks WINS 提供分布式的数据库，为注册和查询的 IP 地址映射到动态 NetBIOS 名称。WINS provides a distributed database for registering and querying dynamic NetBIOS names to IP address mappings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示本地计算机的网络信息。The following code example displays network information for the local computer. summary.span: 获取本地计算机的网络基本输入/输出系统 (NetBIOS) 节点类型。

span.span: Gets the Network Basic Input/Output System (NetBIOS) node type of the local computer.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点类型确定在其中 NetBIOS 名称解析为 IP 地址的方式。The node type determines the way in which NetBIOS names are resolved to IP addresses. 有关其他信息，请参阅类概述。For additional information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示本地计算机的网络信息。The following code example displays network information for the local computer.
